title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Syria 2010
yAxis: Gross domestic product in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Gross domestic product in billion U.S. dollars, containing a total of 27 data points.
Overall Gross domestic product in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 1987 and 1988.
Maximum Gross domestic product in billion U.S. dollars, about 60.04 was reported at Year 2010
The lowest Gross domestic product in billion U.S. dollars, of value 9.85 was reported at Year 1989
